Articles.Content:
Hey guys, 

 

I've been trying to get bdarmory to work for the past 2 days. I've looked up guides tried to install all versions of mods/ksp versions none seem to work. I can get the mod into game but the weapon manager does not work, no buttons work to open up the interface of weapons, guard menu or modules. Can someone please help me to get this mod to work.

 

Thank you, 

 

Mzzcrs

1 hour ago, mzzcrs said:

Hey guys, 

 

I've been trying to get bdarmory to work for the past 2 days. I've looked up guides tried to install all versions of mods/ksp versions none seem to work. I can get the mod into game but the weapon manager does not work, no buttons work to open up the interface of weapons, guard menu or modules. Can someone please help me to get this mod to work.

 

Thank you, 

 

Mzzcrs 

KSP and BDA version you are trying to Install? a screenshot of your GameData folder?  A zipped copy of your KSP.log?

My bet ,, you have as many do , installed it incorrectly or are installing the wrong BDA for your version of KSP

43 minutes ago, SpannerMonkey(smce) said:

KSP and BDA version you are trying to Install? a screenshot of your GameData folder?  A zipped copy of your KSP.log?

My bet ,, you have as many do , installed it incorrectly or are installing the wrong BDA for your version of KSP

Thanks for the reply, 

 

I'm trying to install BDArmory v0.2.1.0 for KSP 1.2.2, unless there's other versions that work, i'm sure there is but I could only find 1.2.2 version of KSP. 

https://ibb.co/kr63oQ
https://ibb.co/bM4Chk

 

https://ufile.io/178e0 KSP log files 

 

 

Thanks again, 

 

Mzzcrs

1 hour ago, mzzcrs said:

https://ibb.co/kr63oQ
https://ibb.co/bM4Chk

NO MOD should ever be installed into the Squad folder ALL mods are placed ONLY in GameData

Move BDArmory  AND any other mod folder out of Squad folder

You have indeed installed incorrectly
